name: Cologne Discovery Set
categories: Fragrance, Value & Gift Sets, Perfume Gift Sets
about: Fragrance Description: Discover a collection of five trial-size vials of signature colognes from Jo Malone London. Wear these scents alone or pair together to create a fragrance that is personal to you..Wood Sage & Sea Salt has notes of ambrette seeds, sea salt, and sage..English Pear & Freesia has notes of King William pear, freesia, and patchouli..Peony & Blush Suede has notes of red apple, peony, and suede..Wild Bluebell has notes of bluebell, persimmon, and white musk..Nectarine Blossom & Honey has notes of cassis, acacia honey, and peach...This set contains:.- 5 x 0.05 oz/ 1.5 mL Cologne in Wood Sage & Sea Salt, English Pear & Freesia, Peony & Blush Suede, Wild Bluebell, Nectarine Blossom & Honey
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Like perfumes or eau de toilettes, colognes are fragrances designed to be worn on the skin. Spritz generously onto your wrists, neck, and pulse points u2013 your body heat will help to diffuse the fragrance as the day goes on. Wear alone or layer with another Cologne or your favorite Bath & Body products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Scent doesnt last. Very disappointed.was hoping to find my new favorite scent, sadly not going to happen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really nice scents, especially for spring/summer. Longevity sucks bad for the price. Not worth the price.

reviews.review_title: Great for testing if it's good on your skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am glad I purchased these and not spending money on the full-size because I found out I don't like any of these popular scents. It smells great at first 30 minutes ,but after that ,it becomes meh. Maybe because it is cologne.
